Fires a Breaching Round forwards, dealing 200% ATK as Physical damage to enemies in the line of fire and pushing them backwards moderately; The Breaching Round will explode and deal 300% ATK as Physical damage to nearby enemies (if the Breaching Round hits a High Ground tile from a low tile, it will immediately explode and deal 600% ATK as Physical damage); Can only be used 2 times every deployment

Fires a Breaching Round forwards, dealing 210% ATK as Physical damage to enemies in the line of fire and pushing them backwards moderately; The Breaching Round will explode and deal 310% ATK as Physical damage to nearby enemies (if the Breaching Round hits a High Ground tile from a low tile, it will immediately explode and deal 620% ATK as Physical damage); Can only be used 2 times every deployment

elite_levels.description: After deployment, immediately throw a Stun Grenade at an enemy within range, Stunning them and nearby enemies for 3 seconds
After deployment, immediately throw a Stun Grenade at an enemy within range, Stunning them and nearby enemies for 4 seconds
During the first deployment, DP Cost -3 and gain 17 SP after deployment

potential_upgrades.description: During the first deployment, DP Cost -3 and gain 20 (+3) SP after deployment
